description: Extended is the most complex of the three original MPEG-4_AVC profiles; it places the greatest demands on a decoder. The constraints on this profile are limited and, like the Main Profile, examples may include intra (I), predicted (P), and bidirectional (B) slice types.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">mp4</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects (formal name); MPEG-4, Advanced Video Coding (part 10), Extended Profile
